content:
Come work with me! Postdoc position in AI working on extending machine learning towards integrating learning and reasoning funded by the Knut and Alice Wallenberg Foundation. We are working on several interesting projects such as learning discrete-continuous models, probabilistic logics (which reasons over observations and predictions), synthetic data generation, and multi-objective deep reinforcement learning.

Please spread it in your networks!

https://liu.se/en/work-at-liu/vacancies?rmpage=job&rmjob=12734&rmlang=UK
